title: Build CSMLS V1 Meta-Learning System with Parallel Agents
skillsDemonstrated: Git worktrees for isolated feature development
keyInsights: Parallel agents dramatically faster than sequential work (10 mins for entire dashboard)
Git worktrees provide visual isolation - branches exist in separate folders
Planning investment pays dividends - clear spec yields clean implementation
Plugin workflows are atomic - cannot pause/resume mid-execution
Token limits at critical moments require emergency protocols
Always validate before merging to main
Honest documentation about incomplete state is better than false completion
Data sync between source and public directories must be managed
Browser caching can cause persistent debugging issues
challenges: Hit token limits (90%) during debugging phase
Switched from plugin context to regular chat - lost workflow continuity
Data files out of sync (data/ vs public/data/)
Session ended incomplete - required recovery next day

actions: Used Opus 4.5 to diagnose dashboard issues
Added cache: 'no-store' to prevent browser caching
